Lapho ushayela umuntu okude ngezinkulungwane zamamayela, usebenzisa isathelayithi.
Isathelayithi esibhakabhakeni sithola ucingo bese silubonisa emuva, cishe ngaso leso sikhathi.
Ososayensi basebenzisa izibonakude esikhaleni ngoba umoya womhlaba uphazamisa ukukhanya kwethu nombono wethu.
Kudinga irobhothi elikhulu elingaphezu kwamamitha angu-100 ukuphakama ukuze kufakwe isathelayithi noma itheleskopu esikhaleni.
Isondo selishintshe umhlaba ngezindlela ezingakholeki. Into enkulu kunazo zonke isondo elisenzele yona ukusinika ukuthutha okulula nokusheshayo.
Lisilethele isitimela, imoto nezinye izinto eziningi zokuhamba.
Ngaphansi kwazo kunamakati amancane anobukhulu obuphakathi adla izisulu ezinobukhulu obuphakathi kusukela emancane kuya kuma-antelope nasezintabeni.
Okokugcina, kunamakati amancane amaningi (kuhlanganise namakati aphilayo) adla izilwane ezincane eziningi kakhulu njengezinambuzane, izimpethu, izinambuzane nezinyoni.
Imfihlo yempumelelo yabo ingumqondo we-niche, umsebenzi okhethekile ikati ngalinye eliwenzayo omvimbela ukuba ancintisane nabanye.
Amabhubesi angamakati ahlangana kakhulu, ahlala emaqenjini amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi ama-pride.
I-Pride yakhiwa owesilisa oyedwa kuya kwabathathu asebekhulile abahlobene nayo, kanye nezinsikazi nezingane ezingaba ngamashumi amathathu.
Ngokuvamile izinsikazi zihlobene kakhulu, ziwumkhaya omkhulu odade namadodakazi.

Izilwane eziziqhenya ngezingonyama zenza izinto ezifana nemihlambi yezimvu noma izinja, izilwane ezifana kakhulu nezingonyama (kodwa hhayi amanye amakati amakhulu) ekuziphatheni, futhi nazo zibulala kakhulu izisulu zazo.
Njengoba ingumdlali ozungezwe kahle, ingwe iyakwazi ukukhuphuka (nakuba ingakhuli kahle), ukubhukuda, ukugijima ibanga elide futhi idonsa ngamandla aphindwe kahlanu kunomuntu oqinile.
Le tiger iseqenjini elifanayo (iGenus Panthera) namabhubesi, amahlosi nama-jaguar.
Ukumemeza kwengwe akufani nokumemeza kwebhubesi, kunalokho kufana nesisho samazwi anomsindo, amemeza.
Ama-ocelot athanda ukudla izilwane ezincane. Azobamba izinkawu, izinyoka, izimpethu nezinyoni uma zikwazi. Cishe zonke izilwane ezizingelwa yi-ocelot zincane kakhulu kunalokho okuyikho.
Ososayensi bacabanga ukuthi ama-ocelots ayalandela futhi athole izilwane azidla (izisulu) ngephunga, eziphunga lapho ziye zahlala khona emhlabathini.
Zibona kahle kakhulu ebumnyameni ngombono wasebusuku, futhi zihamba ngokucasha kakhulu. Ama-ocelots azingela izisulu zawo ngokuzihlanganisa nezindawo ezizungezile bese ehlasela izisulu zawo.

Lapho iqembu elincane lezinto eziphilayo (isixuku esincane) lihlukaniswa nesixuku esiyinhloko esivela kuso (njengokuthi uma lihamba phezu kwentaba noma umfula, noma uma lithuthela esiqhingini esisha ukuze lingakwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) ngokuvamile lizithola lisendaweni ehlukile kunangaphambili.

Le ndawo entsha inezinsizakusebenza ezahlukene nezimbangi ezahlukene, ngakho-ke abantu abasha bazodinga izici ezahlukene noma ukuzivumelanisa nezimo ukuze babe umncintiswano oqinile kunalokho ababekudinga ngaphambili.
Abantu bokuqala abakaze bashintshe nhlobo, basadinga ukuzivumelanisa nezimo njengakuqala.
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, njengoba abantu abasha beqala ukuzivumelanisa nemvelo yabo entsha, baqala ukubukeka bengafani nabanye abantu.
Ekugcineni, ngemva kwezinkulungwane noma ngisho nezigidi zeminyaka, lezi zinhlobo ezimbili zizobukeka zihluke kakhulu kangangokuthi ngeke zikwazi ukubizwa ngokuthi uhlobo olufanayo.
Le nqubo siyibiza ngokuthi ukuhlukahluka, okusho nje ukwakheka kwezinhlobo ezintsha. Ukuhlukahluka kuwumphumela ongenakugwenywa futhi kuyingxenye ebaluleke kakhulu yokuziphendukela kwemvelo.
Izitshalo zikhiqiza umoya-mpilo abantu abawuphefumulayo, futhi zithatha i-carbon-dioxide abantu abawuphefumulayo (okungukuthi, abawuphefumulayo).
Izitshalo zikhiqiza ukudla kwazo elangeni ngokwenza izithombe futhi zinikeza nomthunzi.
Sakha izindlu zethu ngezitshalo futhi senza izingubo ngezitshalo. Iningi lokudla esikudlayo yizitshalo. Izilwane bezingeke ziphile ngaphandle kwezitshalo.
UMosasaurus wayengumzingeli omkhulu kunabo bonke wesikhathi sakhe, ngakho wayengesabi lutho, ngaphandle kwamanye ama-mosasaurus.
Izindebe zayo ezinde zazinamazinyo abukhali angaphezu kuka - 70, kanye nesethi eyengeziwe ophahleni lomlomo wayo, okusho ukuthi kwakungekho ndawo yokuphuma kunoma yini eyayiwela endleleni yayo.

Asazi ngokuqinisekile, kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi lalinolwimi oluphukile, ukudla kwalo kwakuhlanganisa iziphethu, izinhlanzi ezinkulu, ezinye izilwane ezifuywayo, futhi kungenzeka ukuthi laliyi-cannibal.
Iphinde yahlasela noma yini eyayingena emanzini; ngisho ne-dinosaur enkulu efana ne-T. rex yayingeke ilingane nayo.

Nakuba ukudla kwabo okuningi kwakujwayele kithi, amaRoma ayejabulela ukudla okungavamile noma okungavamile, kuhlanganise nengulube yasendle, i-pawn, izigaxa, nohlobo lwezinambuzane olubizwa ngokuthi i-dormouse

Omunye umehluko kwakuwukuthi kuyilapho abantu abampofu nowesifazane bedla ukudla kwabo behleli ezihlalweni, amadoda acebile ayethanda ukuba nemikhosi ndawonye lapho ayelala khona emaceleni awo ngenkathi edla ukudla kwawo.
Ukudla kwaseRoma lasendulo kwakungeke kufake ukudla okwafika eYurophu kuvela eMelika noma e-Asia emakhulwini eminyaka kamuva.
Ngokwesibonelo, babengenawo ummbila, noma utamatisi, noma amazambane, noma i-coa, futhi akekho umRoma wasendulo owake wanambitha unogwaja.
AmaBabiloni akha ngamunye wonkulunkulu bawo ithempeli eliyinhloko elalibhekwa njengekhaya likankulunkulu.
Abantu babeletha imihlatshelo konkulunkulu futhi abapristi bazama ukunakekela izidingo zonkulunkulu ngemikhosi nemikhosi.
Ithempeli ngalinye lalinenkundla yethempeli evulekile bese kuba nendawo engcwele yangaphakathi okwakungenwa kuyo abapristi kuphela.
Ngezinye izikhathi kwakhiwa imibhoshongo ekhethekile enesimo se - pyramid, ebizwa ngokuthi ama - ziggurats, eyayiyingxenye yethempeli.
Isiqongo sombhoshongo sasiyisiphephelo esikhethekile sonkulunkulu.
Ngenxa yesimo sezulu esifudumele saseMpumalanga Ephakathi, indlu yayingabalulekile kangako.
Iningi lokuphila komkhaya wamaHeberu lenzeka ngaphandle.
Abesifazane babepheka egcekeni; izitolo zaziyizitolo ezivulekile ezibheke emgwaqweni.
Kwakungekho amahlathi amakhulu ezweni laseKhanani, ngakho izinkuni zazibiza kakhulu.
Ezinganekwaneni zaseNorse kuthiwa u-Erik Omomvu wadingiselwa e-Iceland ngenxa yokubulala, futhi lapho ehamba entshonalanga, wathola iGreenland wayiqamba ngokuthi iGreenland.
Kodwa naphezu kokutholakala kwakhe, izizwe zama-Eskimo zase zihlala khona ngaleso sikhathi.
Nakuba izwe ngalinye laliyisizwe 'saseScandinavia,' kwakunokwehluka okuningi phakathi kwabantu, amakhosi, amasiko nomlando waseDenmark, eSweden, eNorway nase-Iceland.
Uma uke wabukela ifilimu ethi National Treasure, ungase ucabange ukuthi kwakubhalwe imephu yengcebo ngemuva kweSitatimende Sokuzimela.
Nakuba kunento ebhaliwe ngemuva kwale dokhumenti, akuyona imephu yengcebo.
Ngasemuva kweSitatimende Sokuzimela kwakubhalwe amazwi athi "Isitatimende Sokuzimela Sokuqala sangoJulayi 4, 1776".

Nakuba kungekho owaziyo ngokuqinisekile ukuthi ubani owabhala lo mbhalo, kuyaziwa ukuthi ekuqaleni kokuphila kwawo, lo mbhalo omkhulu wamaphephadonga (osayizi wawo ongamasentimitha angu - 293⁄4 no - 241⁄2) wawugoqwa ukuze ugcinwe.
Ngakho, kungenzeka ukuthi le ncazelo yengezwa njengophawu nje.
Ukufika kosuku lwe-D nezimpi ezilandelayo kwakukhulule enyakatho yeFrance, kodwa eningizimu yayingakabi mahhala.
Leli zwe lalibuswa amaFulentshi "amaVichy", abantu baseFrance ababenze ukuthula namaJalimane ngo-1940 futhi basebenzisana nabahlaseli kunokuba balwe nabo.
Ngo-August 15, 1940, ama-Allies ahlasela eningizimu yeFrance, ukuhlasela kwabizwa ngokuthi "I-Operation Dragoon".
Emasontweni amabili nje kuphela amabutho aseMelika nawaseFrance ayekhulule eningizimu yeFrance futhi ayephendukela eJalimane.
Umuzi wesintu uyisiko eliyingqayizivele elihlanganyelwe yiqembu elikhulu labantu abahlala futhi basebenze ngokubambisana, umphakathi.

Igama elithi impucuko livela egameni lesiLatini elithi civilis, elisho isakhamuzi, elihlobene nelithi civis, elisho isakhamuzi, nelithi civitas, elisho idolobha noma izwe ledolobha, futhi lokho futhi ngandlela-thile kuchaza ubukhulu bomphakathi.
Amadolobha-ezizwe angumanduleli wezizwe. Isiko lempucuko lisho ukudluliswa kolwazi phakathi kwezizukulwane eziningana, umzila wamasiko ohlala njalo nokusabalalisa okulungile.
Amasiko amancane ngokuvamile ayanyamalala ngaphandle kokushiya ubufakazi obufanele bomlando futhi ehluleka ukubonwa njengamasiko afanele.
Phakathi neMpi Yenkululeko, izifundazwe eziyishumi nantathu zaqala zakha uhulumeni ophakathi obuthakathaka ngeCongress eyingxenye yawo kuphela ngaphansi kweZimiso ze-Confederation.

ICongress yayingenalo igunya lokubeka izintela, futhi ngenxa yokuthi yayingekho i - executive noma i - judiciary kazwelonke, yayincike emagunyeni kahulumeni, ayevame ukungabambisani, ukuze iphoqelele zonke izenzo zayo.
Futhi yayingenalo igunya lokulahla imithetho yentela kanye nezintela phakathi kwezifundazwe.
Lezi zihloko zazidinga imvume ngazwi linye yazo zonke izifundazwe ngaphambi kokuba zilungiswe futhi izifundazwe zazithatha uhulumeni ophakathi kalula kangangokuba abameleli bazo babevame ukungabikho.
Ibhola lesizwe lase-Italy, kanye neqembu lesizwe laseJalimane, liyiqembu lesibili eliphumelele kakhulu emhlabeni futhi lalingumqhawe weNdebe yoMhlaba ye-FIFA ngo-2006.
Imidlalo ethandwa kakhulu ihlanganisa ibhola, i-basketball, i-volleyball, i-water-polo, i-fencing, i-rugby, ukuhamba ngebhayisikili, i-ice hockey, i-roller hockey kanye nemincintiswano ye-F1.
Imidlalo yasebusika ithandwa kakhulu ezifundeni ezisenyakatho, futhi amaNtaliyane ancintisana emidlalweni yamazwe ngamazwe nasemicimbini yama-Olimpiki.
IJapane ineziqhingi ezingaba ngu-7.000 (ezinkulu kunazo zonke yiHonshu), okwenza iJapane ibe yisiqhingi sesikhombisa ngobukhulu emhlabeni!
Ngenxa ye-cluster / iqembu leziqhingi iJapane enalo, iJapane ivame ukubizwa, ngokuma komhlaba, ngokuthi "isiqhingi"
Ukuqala kweTaiwan kwaqala emuva ngekhulu le - 15 lapho amatilosi aseYurophu adlula khona aqopha igama lesiqhingi ngokuthi i - Ilha Formosa, noma isiqhingi esihle.

Ngo-1624, iDutch East India Company yasungula isisekelo eningizimu-ntshonalanga yeTaiwan, yaqala ukuguqulwa kwemikhuba yokukhiqiza okusanhlamvu yabomdabu futhi yaqasha abasebenzi baseChina ukuba basebenze ezitshalweni zayo zerayisi noshukela.
Ngo-1683, amabutho aseQing Dynasty (1644-1912) athatha ukulawula izindawo ezisogwini zasentshonalanga nasenyakatho zaseTaiwan futhi amemezela iTaiwan njengezifundazwe zoMbuso waseQing ngo-1885.

Ngo-1895, ngemva kokunqotshwa eMpini Yokuqala YaseChina NaseJapane (1894-1895), uhulumeni waseQing wasayina iSivumelwano SaseShimonoseki, lapho wanikela khona ubukhosi eTaiwan eJapane, eyabusa lesi siqhingi kwaze kwaba ngo-1945.
IMachu Picchu iqukethe izakhiwo ezintathu eziyinhloko, okungukuthi, i-Intihuatana, ithempeli leLanga, kanye negumbi lamafasitela amathathu.
Izakhiwo eziningi ezisemaphethelweni alo mkhakha ziye zakhiwa kabusha ukuze izivakashi ziqonde kangcono ukuthi zazibukeka kanjani ekuqaleni.
Ngo-1976, amaphesenti angamashumi amathathu eMachu Picchu ayesebuyiselwe futhi ukuvuselelwa kuyaqhubeka kuze kube namuhla.
Isibonelo, ifomethi ejwayelekile kakhulu yokuthwebula izithombe emhlabeni yi-35mm, okwakubukhulu befilimu obukhulu ekupheleni kwenkathi yefilimu ye-analog.
Isakhiqizwa nanamuhla, kodwa okubaluleke nakakhulu, isilinganiso sayo sokubukeka siye sazuza njengefa ngamafomethi wezinzwa zesithombe sekhamera yedijithali.
Ifomethi engu-35mm empeleni, ngokudideka, ingu-36mm ububanzi ngo-24mm ukuphakama.
Ngakho-ke, isilinganiso sezinhlayiya zaleli fomethi (ukuhlukanisa ngamashumi amabili nambili ukuze kutholakale isilinganiso esilula kunazo zonke sezinombolo eziphelele) kuthiwa ngu-3: 2.
Amafomethi amaningi avamile (ngokwesibonelo, umndeni wamafomethi we-APS) alingana noma asondela eduze nalesi sici.
Umthetho wesithathu, ohlukunyezwa kakhulu futhi ngokuvamile uhleka usulu, uwumhlahlandlela olula odala amandla ngenkathi ugcina isilinganiso esithile sokuhleleka esithombeni.
Ibonisa ukuthi indawo ephumelela kunazo zonke kumuntu oyisisekelo ukuhlangana kwemigqa ehlukanisa isithombe sibe yingxenye yesithathu ngokuqondile nangokuqondile (bheka isibonelo).
Phakathi nalesi sikhathi somlando waseYurophu, iSonto LamaKatolika, elalicebile futhi linamandla, lahlolwa ngokucophelela.
Sekuyiminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane inkolo yobuKristu ibopha amazwe aseYurophu ndawonye naphezu kokungafani kolimi namasiko.
Amandla ayo angenakuqhathaniswa athinta wonke umuntu, kusukela enkosini kuya emphakathini.
Enye yezimfundiso eziyinhloko zobuKristu iwukuthi ingcebo kufanele isetshenziselwe ukunciphisa ukuhlupheka nobuphofu nokuthi izimali zemali zesonto zikhona ngokukhethekile ngenxa yalesi sizathu.
Isiphathimandla esiyinhloko sesonto sasiseRoma iminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane futhi lokhu kugxila kwamandla nemali kwabangela abaningi ukuba babuze ukuthi le mfundiso yayigcinwa yini.
Ngokushesha ngemva kokuqubuka kwezimpi, iBrithani yaqala ukuvinjezelwa kweJalimane.

Leli qhinga laba nempumelelo, lavimbela izimpahla ezibalulekile zempi nezomphakathi, nakuba lokhu kuvinjelwa kwaphula umthetho wamazwe omhlaba owamukelwa kabanzi owenziwe ngezivumelwano eziningi zamazwe omhlaba kule minyaka engamakhulu amabili edlule.
IBrithani yayimayini emanzini aphesheya kwezilwandle ukuze imikhumbi ingangeni ezingxenyeni eziphelele zolwandle, ibangele ingozi ngisho nasemikhumbi engathathi hlangothi.
Njengoba kwaba nokusabela okulinganiselwe kulobu buqili, iJalimane yayilindele ukusabela okufanayo empini yayo engavinjelwe yemikhumbi engaphansi kwamanzi.
Phakathi nawo-1920s, isimo sengqondo esivamile sezakhamizi nezizwe eziningi sasingesokuthula nokuzihlukanisa.
Ngemva kokubona izinsongo nobubi bempi phakathi neMpi Yezwe I, izizwe zafisa ukugwema isimo esinjalo esikhathini esizayo.
Ngo-1884, uTesla wathuthela e-United States of America ukuze amukele umsebenzi ne-Edison Company eNew York City.
Wafika e-US enezinhlamvu ezi-4 ngegama lakhe, incwadi yezinkondlo, kanye nencwadi yokuncoma evela kuCharles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambilini) kuThomas Edison.
IChina lasendulo lalinendlela eyingqayizivele yokubonisa izinkathi ezahlukene zesikhathi; isigaba ngasinye seChina noma umndeni ngamunye owawusemandleni wawuyinzalo ehlukile.
Futhi phakathi kwenkosi ngayinye kwakukhona inkathi engazinzile yezifundazwe ezahlukene.
Phakathi nalezo zikhathi kwaba nempi enzima phakathi kwezikhulu eziningi ezazilwela isihlalo sobukhosi.

Imibuso Emithathu yayiyisinye sezikhathi ezichitha igazi kakhulu emlandweni waseChina Wasendulo. Izinkulungwane zabantu zafa zilwela ukuhlala esihlalweni esiphakeme kunazo zonke esigodlweni esikhulu saseXian.

Kunemiphumela eminingi yezenhlalakahle nezombusazwe njengokusetshenziswa kohlelo lwe-metric, ukushintshashintsha okuvela ekuzimiseleni ukuya kwe-republicanism, ubuzwe kanye nenkolelo yokuthi izwe lingelabantu hhayi umbusi oyedwa.
Futhi ngemva kweNguquko imisebenzi yayivulekele bonke abafakizicelo besilisa evumela abafisa kakhulu futhi abaphumelelayo ukuba baphumelele.
Lokhu kuyafana nasemkhosini ngoba esikhundleni sokuthi amazinga omkhosi asuselwe esigabeni, manje asuselwa ku-cailaber.
INguquko YaseFrance yaphefumulela nabanye abantu abaningi abacindezelwe abasebenza kwamanye amazwe ukuba baqale izinguquko zabo.
UMohammed wayenesithakazelo esijulile ezindabeni ezingaphandle kwalokhu kuphila kwansuku zonke. Wayevame ukuya emhumeni owaziwa ngokuthi Hira eNtabeni ye Noor (ukukhanya) ukuze acabange.
Umhume uqobo, osinde ezikhathini, unikeza isithombe esicacile kakhulu sokuthambekela kukaMuhammad ngokomoya.
Ephumula esiqongweni sezintaba ezisenyakatho yeMecca, le ntaba ihlukaniswe ngokuphelele nomhlaba wonke.
Eqinisweni, akulula ukuyithola ngisho noma umuntu azi ukuthi ikhona.
Ayikho into ebonakalayo ngaphandle kwesibhakabhaka esicacile, esihle esiphezulu nezintaba eziningi ezizungezile.
I - Great Pyramid yaseGiza ingeyodwa nje phakathi kwezimangaliso eziyisikhombisa ezisekhona nanamuhla.
Yakhiwa abaseGibhithe ngekhulu lesithathu B.C.E., iPhiramidi Elikhulu ingenye yezakhiwo eziningi ezinkulu zamaphiramidi ezakhiwe ukuhlonipha uFaro oshonile.

I-Giza Plateau, noma "iGiza Necropolis" e-Egypt Valley of the Dead iqukethe ama-pyramid amaningana (apho iphiramidi elikhulu likhulu kakhulu), amathuna amancane amaningana, amathempeli amaningana ne-Sphinx enkulu.
Iphiramidi elikhulu lakhiwa ukuze kuhlonishwe uFaro Khufu, futhi eziningi zamaphiramidi amancane, amathuna namathempeli zakhiwa ukuze kuhlonishwe omkaKhufu namalungu omndeni wakhe.
Uphawu oluthi "up bow" lubukeka lufana ne-V kanti "down bow mark" lubukeka lufana nesibambo noma isikwele esingasekho ohlangothini lwaso olungezansi.
Phezulu kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale esiqongweni bese ushaya umnsalo, bese phansi kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale ku-frog (lapho isandla sakho sibamba umnsalo) bese udonsa umnsalo.
Umcibisholo ophakeme uvame ukukhiqiza umsindo omnene, kuyilapho umcibisholo ophansi uqinile futhi uqiniseka ngokwengeziwe.
Zizwe ukhululekile ukufaka amapenizi akho, kodwa khumbula ukuthi amapeni aphrintiwe akhona ngesizathu somculo, ngakho ngokuvamile kufanele ahlonishwe.

Inkosi ethukile uLouis XVI, iNdlovukazi uMarie Antoinette izingane zabo ezimbili ezincane (uMarie Therese oneminyaka engu-11 ubudala noLouis-Charles oneminyaka emine ubudala) nodadewabo wenkosi, uNksz Elizabeth, ngo-Okthoba 6, 1789 baphoqeleka ukuba babuyele eParis bevela eVersailles yiqembu labesifazane bezimakethe.
Behamba ngenqola, babuyela eParis bezungezwe isixuku sabantu abamemeza futhi bememeza besongela iNkosi neNdlovukazi.
Isixuku sabantu saphoqa inkosi nendlovukazi ukuba ivule amafasitela enqola.
Ngesinye isikhathi ilungu lesixuku lathinta ikhanda lomlindi wasebukhosini owabulawa eVersailles phambi kwendlovukazi eyayethukile.
Izindleko zempi zobukhosi base - United States zokunqoba iPhilippines zazikhokhelwa abantu basePhilippines ngokwabo.

Baphoqeleka ukuba bakhokhe izintela kuhulumeni wamakoloni wase-United States ukuze bakhokhe ingxenye enkulu yezindleko kanye nenzalo kumabhondi ayehamba egameni likahulumeni wasePhilippines ngokusebenzisa amabhange aseWall Street.
Yiqiniso, inzuzo enkulu etholakala ekuxhaphazeni abantu basePhilippines isikhathi eside yayiyoba inzuzo eyisisekelo yombuso wasebukhosini wase - United States.
Ukuze siqonde amaTemplar kumelwe siqonde umongo owashukumisela ukudalwa kwe-oda.
Inkathi lapho izenzakalo zenzeka khona ivame ukubizwa ngokuthi i-High Middle Ages isikhathi somlando waseYurophu ngekhulu le-11, le-12 nele-13 (AD 10001300).
I-High Middle Ages yayandulelwa i-Early Middle Ages futhi ilandelwe yi-Late Middle Ages, okuyinto ngokwesivumelwano iphela cishe ngo-1500.

I-determinism yezobuchwepheshe yigama elihlanganisa uhla olubanzi lwemibono ekusebenzeni, kusuka ekucindezelweni kwezobuchwepheshe noma ekufuneni kwezobuchwepheshe kuya emqondweni oqinile wokuthi ikusasa lomuntu liqhutshwa yinqubo engokwemvelo ehlobene nemithetho yesayensi nokubonakaliswa kwayo kwezobuchwepheshe.

Izincazelo eziningi ze-determinism yezobuchwepheshe zabelana ngemibono emibili ejwayelekile: ukuthi ukuthuthukiswa kobuchwepheshe uqobo lulandela indlela edlula kakhulu ithonya lezamasiko noma lezombusazwe, nokuthi ubuchwepheshe bubuye "bunemiphumela" emiphakathini engokwemvelo, kunokuba ibekwe ngaphansi kwezimo zenhlalo.
Ngokwesibonelo, umuntu angase athi imoto yemoto ngokuqinisekile iholela ekwakhiweni kwemigwaqo.
Nokho, inethiwekhi yomgwaqo kazwelonke ayinakwenzeka ngokwezomnotho ezimotweni ezimbalwa nje, ngakho kuthuthukiswa izindlela ezintsha zokukhiqiza ukuze kuncishiswe izindleko zokuphatha izimoto.
Ukuba khona kwezimoto ngobuningi nakho kuholela ekwandeni kwezingozi emigwaqweni, okuholela ekwakhiweni kwamasu amasha emkhakheni wezokunakekelwa kwezempilo ukuze kulungiswe izidumbu ezilimele.
Uthando lwalunezici ezinkulu zokunquma amasiko, olwaluthathwe kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, uFichte noSchlegel.

Endabeni yeRomanticism, i-geography yabumba abantu, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwavela amasiko namasiko ahlobene naleyo ndawo, futhi lawa, ahambisana nendawo yomphakathi, ayengcono kunemithetho eyanqunywa ngokuzithandela.
Ngendlela iParis eyaziwa ngayo njengenhloko-dolobha yemfashini yomhlaba wanamuhla, iConstantinople yayibhekwa njengenhloko-dolobha yemfashini yaseYurophu ye-feudal.
Idumela layo lokuba yisikhungo sokunethezeka laqala cishe ngo - 400 C.E. futhi laqhubeka kwaze kwaba cishe ngo - 1100 C.E.

Isimo sayo sawohloka phakathi nekhulu leshumi nambili ikakhulukazi ngenxa yokuthi amaCrusaders abuya ephethe izipho ezinjengezilulu nezinongo ezazibaluleke kakhulu kunalokho imakethe yaseByzantine eyayikunikeza.
Kwakungalesi sikhathi lapho kudluliselwa khona isihloko seMfashini Capital esuka eConstantinople saya eParis.
Isitayela seGothic safinyelela umvuthwandaba phakathi kwekhulu le-10 nele-11 leminyaka nelikhulu le-14.
Ekuqaleni ukugqoka kwakuthinta kakhulu isiko laseByzantium empumalanga.
Nokho, ngenxa yezindlela zokuxhumana ezihamba kancane, izitayela zasentshonalanga zazingahle zishiye emuva ngeminyaka engu-25 kuya kwengu-30.
Ekupheleni kweNkathi Ephakathi, iNtshonalanga Yurophu yaqala ukuthuthukisa isitayela sayo.
Ukuziphilisa kwezolimo kuyinto yezolimo eyenziwa ukukhiqiza ukudla okwanele ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nezidingo zomlimi nomndeni wakhe kuphela.
Ukulima okusekelayo kuyisistimu elula, evame ukuba ne-organic, esebenzisa imbewu egcinwe emvelweni ehlangene nokujikeleza kwezitshalo noma amanye amasu alula ngokwanele ukukhulisa isivuno.
Ngokomlando, iningi labalimi lalisebenza kwezolimo futhi lokhu kusenzeka namanje emazweni amaningi asathuthuka.
Amasiko angaphansi ahlanganisa abantu abanomqondo ofanayo abazizwa benganakwa yizindinganiso zomphakathi futhi abavumele ukuba bathuthukise umuzwa wobunikazi.
Amasiko angaphansi angahlukaniswa ngenxa yobudala, ubuhlanga, isigaba, indawo, kanye / noma ubulili bamalungu.
Izimfanelo ezinquma isizinda sesiko njengesihlukile zingaba ulimi, ubuhle, inkolo, ezombusazwe, ezocansi, ezendawo, noma inhlanganisela yezici.
Amalungu amasiko angaphansi ngokuvamile abonisa ubulungu bawo ngokusebenzisa isitayela esiyingqayizivele nesifanekiselayo, esihlanganisa imfashini, indlela yokuziphatha, ne-argot.

Enye yezindlela ezivame kakhulu ezisetshenziselwa ukubonisa ukubaluleka kokuhlalisana nomphakathi ukusebenzisa izimo ezimbalwa ezibuhlungu zezingane ezazingahlalisani nabantu abadala ngenkathi zikhula, ngenxa yokunganaki, inhlekelele, noma ukuhlukunyezwa ngamabomu.

Izingane ezinjalo zibizwa ngokuthi "izilwane zasendle" noma zasendle. Ezinye izingane zasendle ziye zavalelwa abantu (ngokuvamile abazali bazo); kwezinye izimo lokhu kushiywa kwengane kwakubangelwa ukwenqatshwa abazali ukukhubazeka okungokwengqondo noma ngokomzimba okukhulu kwengane.
Izingane zasendle zingase zibe nokuhlukunyezwa noma ukuhlukunyezwa okukhulu kwezingane ngaphambi kokuba zishiywe noma zibaleke.
Abanye kuthiwa bakhuliswa izilwane; abanye kuthiwa bahlala endle bebodwa.

Lapho ikhuliswa ngokuphelele yizilwane ezingezona ezomuntu, ingane yasendle ikhombisa ukuziphatha (ngaphakathi kwemingcele yomzimba) cishe ngokuphelele njengaleyo yesilwane esikhathalelayo, njengokwesaba noma ukungabi nandaba nabantu.
Nakuba ukufunda okusekelwe kumaphrojekthi kufanele kwenze ukufunda kube lula futhi kuthakazelise ngokwengeziwe, ukuhlelwa kwezikhumbuzo kudlulela ngalé kwalokho.

I-Scaffolding akuyona indlela yokufunda kodwa kunalokho iyisiza esinikeza ukusekelwa kubantu ababhekana nokuhlangenwe nakho okusha kokufunda njengokusebenzisa uhlelo olusha lwekhompyutha noma ukuqala iphrojekthi entsha.
Ama-scaffold angaba ngokoqobo futhi abe ngokoqobo, ngamanye amazwi, uthisha uyindlela yescaffold kodwa kanjalo nomuntu omncane we-paperclip ku-Microsoft Office.
Ama-Virtual Scaffolds afakwa ngaphakathi kwesofthiwe futhi ahloselwe ukubuza, ukucela nokuchaza izinqubo okungenzeka zaba yinselele kumfundi ukubhekana nazo yedwa.
Izingane zibekwa e-Foster Care ngenxa yezizathu ezihlukahlukene ezihlanganisa ukunganakwa, ukuhlukunyezwa ngisho nokuxhashazwa.
Akekho umntwana okudingeka akhulele endaweni engakhulisi, enganakekeli futhi engakhulisi, kodwa uyazikhulisela.
Sicabanga ukuthi uhlelo lokunakekela izingane ezifuywayo luyisikhungo sokuphepha salezi zingane.
Uhlelo lwethu lokunakekelwa kwabantu abadala kufanele lunikeze amakhaya aphephile, abanakekeli abanothando, imfundo eqinile, nokunakekelwa kwezempilo okunokwethenjelwa.
Ukunakekelwa kokutholwa kufanele kunikeze zonke izinto ezidingekayo ezazingekho ekhaya ababekuthathwe kulo ngaphambili.
I-Internet ihlanganisa izici zokuxhumana ngobuningi nezokuxhumana phakathi kwabantu.
Izici ezihlukile ze-Inthanethi ziholela ezingeni elengeziwe maqondana nokusetshenziswa kanye nendlela yokwaneliseka.
Isibonelo, learning kanye socialization ziphakanyiswa njengezizathu ezibalulekile zokusebenzisa i-intanethi (James et al., 1995).
Ukuzibandakanya komuntu siqu kanye nobudlelwano obuqhubekayo nakho kwaboniswa njengezici ezintsha zokushukumisela ngu-Eighmey noMcCord (1998) lapho bephenya ukusabela kwezilaleli kumawebhusayithi.
Ukusetshenziswa kokurekhodwa kwevidiyo kuye kwaholela ekutholeni izinto ezibalulekile ekuchazeni ama-micro-expressions, ukunyakaza kobuso okuhlala imizuzwana embalwa.
Ikakhulukazi, kuthiwa umuntu angabona ukuthi umuntu uqamba amanga yini ngokuhumusha kahle izinkulumo ezincane.

U-Oliver Sacks, ephepheni lakhe elithi The President's Speech, wabonisa indlela abantu abangakwazi ngayo ukuqonda inkulumo ngenxa yokulimala kobuchopho abakwazi ngayo ukuhlola ngobuqotho ngokunembile.
Usikisela nokuthi amakhono anjalo okuchaza ukuziphatha komuntu angase ahlanganiswe nezilwane ezifana nezinja zasendlini.
Ucwaningo lwekhulu lama-20 luye lwabonisa ukuthi kunezinhlobo ezimbili zokuhlukahluka kwezakhi zofuzo: okufihliwe nokuveziwe.
Ukuguquguquka kufaka ukuhlukahluka okusha kofuzo, futhi ukukhetha kuyisusa echibini lokuhlukahluka okuveziwe.
Ukuhlukaniswa nokuhlanganiswa kabusha kuhlanganisa ukuhlukahluka phakathi kwamachibi amabili ngesizukulwane ngasinye.
Esigodini, kunzima ukuba izilwane eziyinhloko ezinesimiso sokugaya ukudla esifana nesomuntu zinelise izidingo zazo zama-amino acid ezitholakala emithonjeni yezitshalo.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukwehluleka ukwenza kanjalo kunemiphumela emibi: ukukhula okucindezelayo, ukungondleki kahle, futhi ekugcineni ukufa.
Izinsizakusebenza zezitshalo ezifinyeleleka kalula kwakuyoba amaprotheni afinyeleleka emaqabungeni nasezihlahleni, kodwa lezi zinambuzane ezinjengathi kunzima ukuzigaya ngaphandle kokuthi ziphekwe.
Ngokuphambene nalokho, ukudla kwezilwane (izimpethu, ama-termites, amaqanda) akugcini nje ngokugayeka kalula, kodwa kunikeza amaprotheni amaningi aqukethe wonke ama-amino acid abalulekile.
Uma sicabanga ngakho konke, akumelwe simangale uma okhokho bethu bexazulula "inkinga yabo yamaprotheni" ngendlela efanayo neyamakhaza ase savannah namuhla.
Ukuphazamiseka kokulala kuyinqubo yokuvuka ngenhloso phakathi nenkathi yakho evamile yokulala bese ulala isikhashana kamuva (imizuzu engu-1060).
Lokhu kungenziwa kalula ngokusebenzisa i-alamu ethule ukuze ikuvuse ngaphandle kokukuvusa ngokugcwele.
Uma uzithola usetha kabusha iwashi lapho ulele, lingase libekwe ngakolunye uhlangothi lwegumbi, likuphoqe ukuba uvuke embhedeni ukuze ulivale.
Ezinye izindlela ezisekelwe ku-biorhythm zihlanganisa ukuphuza uketshezi oluningi (ikakhulukazi amanzi noma itiye, i-diuretic eyaziwayo) ngaphambi kokulala, okuphoqa umuntu ukuba avuke ukuze ahluze.
Inani lokuthula kwangaphakathi umuntu analo lihlobene ngokuhlukile nenani lokucindezeleka emzimbeni nasemoyeni wakhe.
Lapho ukucindezeleka kuncipha, amandla okuphila ayanda futhi wonke umuntu unethuba lokuthola ukuthula nokwaneliseka okuphelele.
Wonke umuntu angakwazi ukufinyelela ekubonakaleni. Okuwukuphela kwento evimbela lo mgomo ukungezwani kwethu nokunganaki kwethu.
UbuBuddha baseTibetan busekelwe ezimfundisweni zikaBuddha, kodwa bathuthukiswa indlela yothando ye-mahayana kanye namasu amaningi avela ku-Yoga yaseNdiya.
Ngokuyinhloko ubuBuddha baseTibetan bulula kakhulu. Buqukethe iKundalini Yoga, ukuzindla kanye nendlela yothando olubandakanya konke.
Nge-Kundalini Yoga amandla e-Kundalini (amandla okukhanya) avuswa ngezimo ze-yoga, izivivinyo zokuphefumula, ama-mantra nokubukwa.
Isikhungo sokuzindla kwaseTibetan yi-Deity Yoga. Ngokusebenzisa ukubonwa konkulunkulu abahlukahlukene iziteshi zamandla zihlanzwa, ama-chakra asetshenziswa futhi kwakhiwa ukwazi kokukhanyiselwa.
IJalimane yayiyisitha esivamile eMpini Yezwe II, okwaholela ekusebenzisaneni phakathi kwe-USSR ne-USA. Ekupheleni kwempi ukungqubuzana kwezinhlelo, izinqubo namasiko kwaholela ekuweni kwamazwe.
Eminyakeni emibili ngemva kokuphela kwempi, kwaqala iMpi Yomshoshaphansi.

Kwakufanele kuqhubeke iminyaka engu-40 eyalandela futhi kwakuyokulwa ngokoqobo, ngamabutho agunyaziwe, ezinkundleni zempi kusukela e-Afrika kuya e-Asia, e-Afghanistan, eCuba nakwezinye izindawo eziningi.
Ngo-September 17, 1939, ukuvikelwa kwePoland kwase kuphelile, futhi okuwukuphela kwethemba kwakuwukubuyela emuva futhi uhlele kabusha eceleni kwebhuloho laseRomania.

Nokho, lezi zinhlelo zaphelelwa yisikhathi cishe ngobusuku obubodwa, lapho amasosha angaphezu kuka-800 000 avela e-USSR's Union Red Army engena futhi akha ama-front aseBelarus nase-Ukraine ngemuva kokuhlasela izifunda ezisempumalanga yePoland ngokwephula iSivumelwano Sokuthula saseRiga, iSoviet-Poland Non-Aggression Pact, nezinye izivumelwano zamazwe ngamazwe, zombili ezingaseceleni kanye nezingaseceleni eziningi.
Ukusebenzisa imikhumbi ukuthutha izimpahla kuyindlela ephumelela kunazo zonke yokuhambisa abantu abaningi nezimpahla olwandle.

Umsebenzi wemikhumbi yasolwandle uye waba ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izwe lakho liyalondoloza ikhono lokuhambisa abantu bakho nezimpahla zakho, ngesikhathi esifanayo, liphazamisa ikhono lesitha sakho lokuhambisa abantu nezimpahla zaso.

Esinye sezibonelo eziphawuleka kakhulu zakamuva salokhu kwakuwumkhankaso waseNyakatho ye-Atlantic weMpi Yezwe II. AmaMelika ayezama ukuthutha amadoda nezinto ezibonakalayo ngaphesheya kwe-Atlantic Ocean ukuze asize iBrithani.
Ngesikhathi esifanayo, imikhumbi yasolwandle yaseJalimane, eyayisebenzisa ikakhulu ama-U-boat, yayizama ukumisa lolu hambo.
Ukube ama - Allies ayehlulekile, cishe iJalimane lalizokwazi ukunqoba iBrithani njengoba lalinalo lonke elaseYurophu.
Kubonakala sengathi izimbuzi zaqala ukufuywa eminyakeni engaba ngu - 10 000 edlule ezintabeni zaseZagros e - Iran.
Amasiko nezizwe zasendulo zaqala ukuzigcina ukuze zifinyelele kalula ubisi, izinwele, inyama nezikhumba.

Izimbuzi zasendlini ngokuvamile zazigcinwa emihlambini eyayihambahamba ezintabeni noma kwezinye izindawo zokudlela, ngokuvamile zazinakekelwa abelusi bezimbuzi ababevame ukuba yizingane noma intsha, efana nomalusi owaziwa kakhulu.
Izinqola zazakhiwa eNgilandi ngekhulu le-16.

Nakuba imigwaqo yezinqola yayimane nje iqukethe amapulangwe ahambisanayo, yayivumela amahhashi ukuba ayidonse ukuze athole ijubane elikhulu futhi adonse imithwalo emikhulu kunemigwaqo eyinkimbinkimbi kakhulu yangaleso sikhathi.
Ama-crossties angeniswa kusenesikhathi ukuze agcine imigwaqo isendaweni yayo. Nokho, kancane kancane kwaqashelwa ukuthi imigwaqo yayiyoba ngempumelelo ngokwengeziwe uma yayine-stip yensimbi phezulu.
Lokhu kwaba umkhuba ovamile, kodwa insimbi yabangela ukugqwala okwengeziwe emabhayisikili ezinkuni zezinqola.
Ekugcineni, amasondo okhuni athathelwe indawo amasondo ensimbi.
Ukuthutha kokuqala okwaziwayo kwakuhamba, abantu baqala ukuhamba beqondile eminyakeni eyizigidi ezimbili edlule ngokuvela kweHomo Erectus (okusho ukuthi umuntu oqondile).
Abanduleli babo, i-Australopithecus, babengahambi beqondile njengenjwayelo.

Ukucaciswa kwe-Bipedal kutholakala kuma-Australopithecus fossils kusuka eminyakeni eyizigidi ezingama-4.2-3.9 edlule, yize iSahelanthropus kungenzeka ukuthi yahamba ngezinyawo ezimbili eminyakeni eyizigidi eziyisikhombisa edlule.
Singaqala ukuphila ngendlela enobungane emvelweni, sijoyine ukunyakaza kwezemvelo, futhi sibe izishoshovu ukuze sinciphise ukuhlupheka esikhathini esizayo ngezinga elithile.
Lokhu kufana nokwelashwa kwezimpawu ezimweni eziningi. Nokho, uma singafuni nje isixazululo sesikhashana, kufanele sithole impande yezinkinga futhi sizivimbe.
Kuyacaca ukuthi umhlaba ushintshe kakhulu ngenxa yentuthuko yesintu kwezesayensi nakwezobuchwepheshe, futhi izinkinga ziye zaba zinkulu ngenxa yokwanda kwabantu nendlela yokuphila yabantu.

Ngemva kokwamukelwa yiCongress ngoJulayi 4, umklamo obhalwe ngesandla osayinwe nguMongameli weCongress uJohn Hancock noNobhala uCharles Thomson wathunyelwa emigwaqweni embalwa kude nasendaweni yokunyathelisa kaJohn Dunlap.
Phakathi nobusuku kwakhiwa amakhophi angu-150 kuya kwangu-200, manje aziwa ngokuthi "ama-broadsides aseDunlap".
Ukufundwa komqulu wokuqala obala kwaba nguJohn Nixon egcekeni le-Independence Hall ngoJulayi 8.
Elinye lathunyelwa kuGeorge Washington ngoJulayi 6, owalifundela amasosha akhe eNew York ngoJulayi 9. Ikhophi yafika eLondon ngo-August 10.
Amapheshana angu-25 aseDunlap asaziwa ukuthi akhona angamakhophi amadala kunawo wonke alokhu ekhona.
Ososayensi abaningi bezinkanyezi namuhla bakholelwa ukuthi kuneqembu elilodwa lama-dinosaur eliye lasinda futhi liyaphila namuhla.
Abantu abaningi abacabangi ukuthi bangama-dinosaurs ngoba banezimpaphe futhi bayakwazi ukundiza.
Kodwa kunezinto eziningi ngezinyoni ezisabukeka njengezinambuzane.
Zinezinyawo ezinamasikali nezingalo, zifaka amaqanda, futhi zihamba ngezinyawo zazo ezimbili ezingemuva njenge-T-Rex.
Cishe wonke amakhompyutha asetshenziswayo namuhla asekelwe ekusebenziseni ulwazi olukhodiwe ngesimo sezinombolo ezimbili.

Inombolo ye-binary ingaba nenani elilodwa kuphela lamagugu amabili, okungukuthi u-0 noma u-1, futhi lezi zinombolo zibizwa ngokuthi izinombolo ze-binary - noma ama-bits, ukusebenzisa i-jargon yekhompyutha.
Ukungezwani kwangaphakathi kungase kungabonakali ngokushesha. Izimpawu, njengokuhlanza, zivamile ngokwanele ukuba kungabi khona ukuxilongwa okusheshayo.
Isibonakaliso esihle kakhulu sokuthi kunobuthi bangaphakathi singase sibe khona esitsheni esivulekile semithi noma amakhemikhali anobuthi asekhaya.
Hlola ilebula ukuze uthole imiyalelo ethile yosizo lokuqala yaleso sinambuzane.
Igama elithi bug lisetshenziswa izazi zezinambuzane ngomqondo ongokomthetho kuleli qembu lezinambuzane.
Leli gama livela ekujwayelaneni kwasendulo nezinambuzane, ezizinambuzane ezizivumelanise kahle nokubulala abantu.
Kokubili izinambuzane ezibulalayo nezinambuzane ezingekho embhedeni ziyizinambuzane, ezijwayele ukuhlala esidlekeni noma ezindlini zabaphathi bazo.
E-United States of America, kunezimo ezingaba ngu-400.000 ezaziwayo ze-Multiple Sclerosis (MS), okwenza kube yisifo esiyinhloko sezinzwa kubantu abadala abasebasha naphakathi.
I-MS yisifo esithinta isimiso sezinzwa esiphakathi, esakhiwa ubuchopho, umgogodla kanye nenzwa ebonakalayo.
Ucwaningo luthole ukuthi abesifazane banamathuba aphindwe kabili okuba ne-MS kunamadoda.
Umbhangqwana ungase unqume ukuthi akuyona into eyilungele wona, noma ingane yawo, ukukhulisa ingane.
Lezi zithandani zingase zikhethe ukwenza uhlelo lokutholwa kwengane yazo.
Ekutholeni ingane, abazali abazalelwayo bayayeka ilungelo labo lokuba abazali ukuze omunye umbhangqwana ube ngumzali wengane.
Umgomo oyinhloko wesayensi ukuthola indlela umhlaba osebenza ngayo ngokusebenzisa indlela yesayensi.

Akuyona yodwa noma kunjalo, ukuhlolwa, futhi ukuhlolwa kuyisivivinyo esisetshenziselwa ukuqeda enye noma eziningi zezizathu ezingaba khona, ukubuza imibuzo, nokwenza ukubonwa nakho kuqondisa ucwaningo lwesayensi.
Izazi zemvelo nezazi zefilosofi zagxila emibhalweni yakudala, ikakhulukazi eBhayibhelini lesiLatini.
Kwavunyelwana ngemibono ka-Aristotle ngazo zonke izindaba zesayensi, kuhlanganise nezingqondo.
Njengoba ulwazi lwesiGreki lwaluwohloka, iNtshonalanga yazithola ihlukanisiwe nezimpande zayo zefilosofi nezesayensi zesiGreki.
Izintambo eziningi ezibhekwayo ekuziphatheni nasekuziphatheni ngokuvamile zincike kakhulu ebukhoneni bemijikelezo ye-endogenous nokukhiqizwa kwayo ngamawashi ebhayoloji.
Ama-rhythms avamile, okungewona nje izimpendulo zezimpawu zangaphandle ezivamile, abhalwe izidalwa eziningi eziphilayo, ezihlanganisa amabhaktheriya, ama-fungus, izitshalo nezilwane.
Amawashi ezinto eziphilayo angama-oscillator azigcinayo aqhubeka nesikhathi sokuhamba ngebhayisikili ngisho nalapho kungekho zibonakaliso zangaphandle.
Ukuhlolwa kukaHershey noChase kwaba esinye seziphakamiso eziyinhloko zokuthi i-DNA yayiyizinto zofuzo.
UHershey noChase basebenzisa ama-phages, noma amagciwane, ukuze bafake i-DNA yabo ebhaktheriya.
Benza izivivinyo ezimbili zokuphawula i-DNA e-phage nge-phosphorus enomswakama noma amaprotheni e-phage anesibabule enomswakama.
Izinguquko zingaba nemiphumela ehlukahlukene kuye ngohlobo lwezinguquko, ukubaluleka kwesiqeshana sezakhi zofuzo ezithintekayo nokuthi amaseli athintekayo angamaselula omugqa we-germ yini.
Izingane zingadluliselwa kuphela izinguquko ezisesezingqamuzaneni zembewu, kuyilapho izinguquko kwezinye izindawo zingadala ukufa kwamangqamuzana noma umdlavuza.
Ezokuvakasha ezisekelwe emvelweni ziheha abantu abanentshisekelo yokuvakashela izindawo zemvelo ngenjongo yokujabulela indawo, kuhlanganise nezilwane nezilwane zasendle.
Izibonelo zemisebenzi yasendaweni zihlanganisa ukuzingela, ukudoba, ukuthatha izithombe, ukubuka izinyoni, nokuvakashela amapaki nokutadisha ulwazi mayelana nemvelo.
Isibonelo salokhu ukuvakashela, ukuthatha izithombe nokufunda ngama-organatuang aseBorneo.
Nsuku zonke ekuseni, abantu bashiya amadolobha amancane asezindaweni zasemaphandleni ngemoto beya emsebenzini futhi badlula abanye abantu abafika lapho beya khona.
Kulolu hambo lokuthutha olunamandla wonke umuntu ngandlela-thile uxhumeke, futhi usekela, uhlelo lokuthutha olusekelwe ezimotweni ezizimele.

Isayensi manje ibonisa ukuthi le nkampani enkulu ekhiqiza ikhabhoni iye yasusa umkhathi wezinto eziphilayo kwesinye sezimo zawo ezizinzile eziye zasekela ukuziphendukela kwemvelo komuntu eminyakeni eyizigidi ezimbili edlule.
Wonke umuntu uhlanganyela emphakathini futhi usebenzisa izinhlelo zokuhamba. Cishe wonke umuntu ukhononda ngezinhlelo zokuhamba.
Emazweni athuthukile akuvamile ukuzwa izinga elifanayo lezinkathazo ngekhwalithi yamanzi noma ukuwa kwamabhuloho.
Kungani amasistimu ezokuthutha edala izikhalazo ezinjalo, kungani ehluleka nsuku zonke?
Ukuhamba komgwaqo kuyisifundo sokuhamba komshayeli ngamunye nezimoto phakathi kwamaphoyinti amabili nokuxhumana abakwenzayo nomunye nomunye.
Ngeshwa, ukufunda ukuhamba komgwaqo kunzima ngoba ukuziphatha komshayeli akukwazi ukubikezelwa ngokuqiniseka okungamaphesenti ayikhulu.
Ngenhlanhla, abashayeli bathambekele ekuziphatheni ngaphakathi kwebanga elihambisanayo; ngakho-ke, ukuhamba komgwaqo kuthambekele ekuhambisaneni okunengqondo futhi kungaboniswa cishe ngokwezibalo.
Ukuze kuboniswe kangcono ukugeleza komgwaqo, kuye kwasungulwa ubudlelwano phakathi kwezici ezintathu eziyinhloko: (1) ukugeleza, (2) ubukhulu, (3) ijubane.
Lezi zibopho zisiza ekuhleleni, ekwakheni nasekusebenzeni kwezakhiwo zomgwaqo.
Izinambuzane zaziyizilwane zokuqala ezindiza emoyeni, futhi ikhono lazo lokundiza lazisiza ukuba zibalekele kalula izitha futhi zithole ukudla nezihlobo ngendlela ephumelelayo.
Izinambuzane eziningi zinenzuzo yokukwazi ukugoba amaphiko azo emzimbeni wazo.
Lokhu kubanikeza izindawo eziningi ezincane zokucasha ezilwaneni ezizingelayo.
Namuhla, okuwukuphela kwezinambuzane ezingakwazi ukugoba amaphiko azo yizimpukane zedrako nezimpukane ze-mayfly.
Eminyakeni eyizinkulungwane edlule, indoda ebizwa ngokuthi u-Aristarchus yathi uhlelo lwelanga lwalujikeleza ilanga.
Abanye abantu babecabanga ukuthi wayeqinisile kodwa abantu abaningi babekholelwa okuphambene nalokho; ukuthi iSolar System yayizungeza uMhlaba, kuhlanganise neLanga (kanye nezinye izinkanyezi).
Lokhu kubonakala kunengqondo, ngoba uMhlaba awuzizwa sengathi uyahamba, akunjalo?
UMfula i-Amazon ungumfula wesibili omude kunawo wonke futhi omkhulu kunayo yonke emhlabeni. Uthwala amanzi amaningi izikhathi ezingaphezu kweziyisishiyagalombili kunomfula wesibili ngobukhulu.
I-Amazon ingumfula obanzi kunayo yonke emhlabeni, ngezinye izikhathi ububanzi bayo bungamakhilomitha ayisithupha.
Amanzi angamaphesenti angu-20 aphuma emifuleni yeplanethi aya olwandle avela e-Amazon.
Umfula omkhulu i-Amazon ungamakhilomitha angu-6.387 (3.980 miles).
Nakuba ukwakhiwa kwamaphiramidi ngetshe kwaqhubeka kwaze kwaba sekupheleni koMbuso Omdala, amaphiramidi aseGiza awazange adlule ngobukhulu bawo nangobungcweti bezobuchwepheshe bokwakhiwa kwawo.
AbaseGibhithe lasendulo ababekhonza eMbusweni Omusha babekhangwa izikhumbuzo ezazingaphambi kwabo, ngaleso sikhathi ezazineminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane ubudala.
IVatican City inabantu abangaba ngu-800. Yizwe elincane kunawo wonke elizimele emhlabeni futhi izwe elinabantu abancane kunawo wonke.
IVatican City isebenzisa isiNtaliyane emithethweni yayo yezomthetho nasezitatimendeni zayo ezisemthethweni.
Ulimi lwesiNtaliyane lubuye lube ulimi olusetshenziswa nsuku zonke yiningi lalabo abasebenza kuhulumeni kanti isiLatini sivame ukusetshenziswa emikhosini yenkolo.
Zonke izakhamuzi zaseVatican City zingamaRoma Katolika.

Abantu baye bazi ngezinto eziyisisekelo zamakhemikhali ezifana negolide, isiliva nethusi kusukela ezikhathini zasendulo, njengoba zonke lezi zingatholakala emvelweni ngendlela yasendaweni futhi zilula ngokwanele ukuzimbiwa ngamathuluzi okuqala.
Isazi sefilosofi u-Aristotle sathi yonke into yakhiwa inhlanganisela yezinto ezine - umhlaba, amanzi, umoya nomlilo.

Lokhu kwakufana kakhulu nezimo ezine zendaba (ngokulandelana okufanayo): eziqinile, eziwuketshezi, igesi, ne-plasma, nakuba futhi wayecabanga ukuthi ziyashintsha zibe izinto ezintsha ukuze zakheke lokho esikubonayo.
Ama-alloys ngokuyinhloko ayingxube yensimbi emibili noma ngaphezulu. Ungakhohlwa ukuthi kunezakhi eziningi etafuleni lezikhathi.
Izinhlayiya ezifana ne-calcium ne-potassium zibhekwa njengezinsimbi. Yiqiniso, kukhona nezinsimbi ezifana nesiliva negolide.
Ungase futhi ube nezingxubevange eziqukethe amanani amancane ezinto ezingezona ezensimbi ezifana nekhabhoni.
Yonke into esemkhathini yenziwe ngendaba. Yonke into yenziwe izinhlayiya ezincane ezibizwa ngokuthi ama-athomu.
Ama-athomu mancane ngendlela engakholeki kangangokuthi izigidigidi zawo zingangena enkathini ekupheleni kwalesi sigwebo.
Ngakho, ipensela laba umngane omuhle kubantu abaningi lapho liphuma.
Ngokudabukisayo, njengoba kuye kwavela izindlela ezintsha zokubhala, ipeni liye lahlanjalazwa futhi lasetshenziswa kancane.
Abantu manje babhala imilayezo ezikrinini zamakhompyutha, bengalokothi basondele kumshini wokubhoboza.
Umuntu angazibuza ukuthi ikhibhodi iyoba yini lapho kuvela okuthile okusha.
Ibhomu lokuhlukana lisebenza ngomgomo wokuthi kuthatha amandla ukuhlanganisa i-nucleus eneprothoni nama-neutron amaningi.
Kufana nokugoqa inqola esindayo enyukele egqumeni, uhlukanise i-nucleus uphinde ukhiphe amandla.
Amanye ama-athomu anama-nucleus angazinzile okusho ukuthi athambekele ekuqhekekeni ngokushaywa kancane noma ngaphandle kokushaywa.
Ubuso benyanga bubunjwa ngamatshe nothuli. Ingqimba engaphandle yenyanga ibizwa ngokuthi i-crust.
Umgogodla unobukhulu obungamakhilomitha angu-70 ohlangothini oluseduze nobukhulu obungamakhilomitha angu-100 ohlangothini olungaphambi.
Kuncane ngaphansi kweMaria futhi kunzima ngaphansi kwezindawo ezisezintabeni eziphakeme.
Kungase kube nama-marias amaningi ohlangothini oluseduze ngoba isikhumba sincane futhi kwakulula ukuba i-lava inyukele ebusweni.
Imibono yokuqukethwe igxile ekutholeni ukuthi yini eyenza abantu bakhangwe noma bakhange.
Lezi zimfundiso ziphakamisa ukuthi abantu banezidingo ezithile nezifiso eziye zangena ngaphakathi njengoba besekhulile.
Lezi zimfundiso zibheka ukuthi yini eyenza abantu abathile babe nesifiso sokwenza izinto abazenzayo nokuthi yini ezobenza benze noma bangazenzi izinto ezithile.
Imibono emibili ethandwayo yokuqukethwe yiMaslow's Hierarchy of Needs Theory kanye neHertzberg's Two Factor Theory.
Ngokuvamile, ukuziphatha okubili kungavela njengoba abaphathi beqala ukuhola ontanga yabo yangaphambili.
Lolu hlobo lomphathi lukuthola kunzima ukwenza izinqumo ezingathandeki, ukwenza izinyathelo zokuyala, ukuhlola ukusebenza, ukunikeza abantu umthwalo wemfanelo nokuziphendulela.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi lochungechunge, umuntu uba umuntu ongaqondakali onomuzwa wokuthi kumelwe ashintshe konke iqembu ebelikwenza futhi alenze libe elakhe.
Phela, ekugcineni umholi nguye obangela impumelelo nokwehluleka kweqembu.
Ngokuvamile lokhu kuziphatha kubangela ukungezwani phakathi kwabaholi nabanye eqenjini.
Amaqembu e-virtual agcinwa ezindinganisweni ezifanayo zokwenza kahle njengamaqembu avamile, kodwa kunokwehluka okuncane.
Amalungu eqembu elibonakalayo avame ukusebenza njengephuzu lokuxhumana leqembu lawo elingokomzimba.
Ngokuvamile banokuzimela okwengeziwe kunamalungu eqembu avamile njengoba amaqembu abo engahlangana ngokuya ngezindawo zezikhathi ezahlukene ezingaqondwa abaphathi babo bendawo.
Ukuba khona kweqembu langempela  elingabonakali (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) nakho kuyingxenye eyingqayizivele yeqembu elibonakalayo.
Iqembu elingabonakali liyiqembu labaphathi lapho ilungu ngalinye libika khona. Iqembu elingabonakali libeka izindinganiso zelungu ngalinye.
Kungani inhlangano ingafuna ukubhekana nenqubo edla isikhathi esithe xaxa yokusungula inhlangano yokufunda?
Lapho zonke izinsiza ezitholakalayo zisetshenziswa ngempumelelo eminyangweni esebenzayo yenhlangano, ubuciko nobuciko bungavela.
Ngenxa yalokho, inqubo yenhlangano esebenza ngokubambisana ukuze inqobe isithiyo ingaholela enkambisweni entsha yokuqamba ukuze ihlangabezane nezidingo zamakhasimende.
Ngaphambi kokuba inhlangano ikwazi ukuqamba izinto ezintsha, ubuholi kumelwe bubumbe isiko lokuqamba izinto ezintsha kanye nolwazi oluhlanganisiwe nokufunda kwenhlangano.
I-Angel (2006), ichaza indlela ye-Continuum njengendlela esetshenziselwa ukusiza izinhlangano zifinyelele ezingeni eliphakeme lokusebenza.
Idatha ye-neurobiological inikeza ubufakazi obubonakalayo bokusebenzisa indlela engokwesayensi yokucwaninga ngengqondo.
Ukuhlobana phakathi kokugula kwengqondo nokuziphatha kusekela ososayensi ocwaningweni lwabo.

Sekuyisikhathi eside kwaziwa ukuthi izinhlobo ezahlukene zokulimala kobuchopho, ukuhlukumezeka, ukulimala kanye nezifo zomzimba kuthinta ukuziphatha futhi kubangele izinguquko kweminye imisebenzi yengqondo.
Ukuvela kobuchwepheshe obusha kusivumela ukuba sibone futhi sihlole izakhiwo nezinqubo zobuchopho ezingakaze zibonwe ngaphambili.
Lokhu kusinikeza ulwazi oluningi nezinto zokwakha amamodeli wokulingisa asisiza ukuba siqonde izinqubo ezingqondweni zethu.
Nakuba i-AI inomqondo oqinile we-science fiction, i-AI yakha igatsha elibaluleke kakhulu lesayensi yamakhompiyutha, ibhekene nokuziphatha, ukufunda nokuzivumelanisa nokuhlakanipha emshinini.
Ucwaningo lwe-AI lubandakanya ukwenza imishini ukuze yenze imisebenzi edinga ukuziphatha okuhlakaniphile.
Izibonelo zihlanganisa ukulawula, ukuhlela nokuhlela, ikhono lokuphendula ukuxilongwa kwamakhasimende nemibuzo, kanye nokuhlonza umbhalo wesandla, izwi nobuso.
Izinto ezinjalo ziye zaba iziyalo ezihlukene, ezigxile ekunikezeni izixazululo zezinkinga zokuphila kwangempela.

Uhlelo lwe-AI manje luvame ukusetshenziswa emikhakheni yezomnotho, imithi, ubunjiniyela nempi, njengoba lwakhiwe kumakhompyutha amaningi asekhaya nasezinhlelo zokusebenza zesoftware yemidlalo yevidiyo.
Ngokuvamile uthisha angathanda ukuthatha abafundi bakhe baye ezindaweni lapho ukuhamba ngebhasi kungeyona inketho.
Ubuchwepheshe bunikeza isixazululo ngohambo lwe-virtual. Abafundi bangabuka izinto zeminyuziyamu, bavakashele i-aquarium, noma bajabulele ubuciko obuhle ngenkathi behlezi neqembu labo.
Ukwabelana ngohambo lwezemfundo ngokoqobo kuyindlela enhle yokucabanga ngohambo nokwabelana ngokuhlangenwe nakho namakilasi azayo.

Ngokwesibonelo, unyaka ngamunye abafundi besikole saseBennet eNyakatho Carolina bakha iwebhusayithi mayelana nohambo lwabo oluya enhloko-dolobha yezwe, unyaka ngamunye iwebhusayithi iyavuselelwa, kodwa izinguqulo ezindala zigcinwa ku-intanethi ukuze zisebenze njengencwadi yezikhala.

Amabhulogi angasiza futhi ekuthuthukiseni ukubhala kwabafundi. Ngenkathi abafundi bevame ukuqala isipiliyoni sabo sebhulogi ngolimi olungahleliwe nokubhala, ukuba khona kwezilaleli ngokuvamile kuyashintsha lokho.
Njengoba abafundi ngokuvamile beyizilaleli ezibucayi kakhulu, umbhali webhulogi uqala ukuzama ukuthuthukisa ukubhala ukuze agweme ukugxekwa.

Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukubhuloga "kuphoqa abafundi ukuba babe nolwazi oluningi mayelana nezwe elibazungezile". Isidingo sokondla isithakazelo sezilaleli siphefumulela abafundi ukuba bahlakaniphe futhi bathakaze (Toto, 2004).
Ukubhuloga kuyithuluzi eligqugquzela ukusebenzisana, futhi likhuthaza abafundi ukuba bandise ukufunda ngaphezu kosuku lwesikole lwendabuko.

Ukusetshenziswa okufanele kwamabhulogi "kunganika amandla abafundi ukuba babe ngabahlaziyi nabahlaziyi ngokwengeziwe; ngokuphendula ngenkuthalo ezintweni ze-Intanethi, abafundi bangachaza izikhundla zabo kumongo wemibhalo yabanye kanye nokuchaza imibono yabo ezindabeni ezithile (Oravec, 2002).
I-Ottawa iyinhloko-dolobha yaseCanada ekhangayo, enezilimi ezimbili futhi inezinhlobonhlobo zemibukiso yezobuciko neminyuziyamu ekhombisa esidlule nesamanje saseCanada.
Ngaseningizimu kunezimpophoma zaseNiagara kanti enyakatho kunobuhle bemvelo obungazange busetshenziswe baseMuskoka nangaphezulu.
Zonke lezi zinto nokuningi kugcizelela i-Ontario njengento abantu bangaphandle abayibheka njengeCanada eyinhloko.
Izindawo ezinkulu ezisenyakatho azinabantu abaningi futhi ezinye zihlale zingenabantu.
Ukuze uqhathanise inani labantu elihlaba abaningi umxhwele: Kunabantu abaningi base-Afrika baseMelika abahlala e-US kunezakhamuzi zaseCanada.
Iziqhingi zaseMpumalanga Afrika zise-Indian Ocean ogwini olusempumalanga ye-Afrika.
IMadagascar iyona enkulu kunazo zonke, futhi iyizwekazi elilodwa uma kukhulunywa ngezilwane zasendle.
Iziqhingi eziningi ezincane ziyizizwe ezizimele, noma ezihlobene neFrance, futhi zaziwa ngokuthi izindawo zokungcebeleka zasolwandle.
Ama-Arabhu nawo aletha inkolo yamaSulumane kulezi zifundazwe, futhi yaqala ukuthandwa kakhulu e - Comoros naseMayotte.
Ithonya nezikoloni zaseYurophu zaqala ngekhulu le-15, lapho umhloli wamaPutukezi uVasco da Gama ethola iCape Route esuka eYurophu iye eNdiya.
Enyakatho, lesi sifunda sinqamula iSahel, futhi eningizimu nasentshonalanga sinqamula i-Atlantic Ocean.
Abesifazane: Kunconywa ukuthi bonke abesifazane abahambahamba bathi bashadile, kungakhathaliseki isimo sabo sangempela somshado.
Kuyasiza futhi ukugqoka indandatho (kodwa hhayi ebiza kakhulu.
Abesifazane kufanele baqaphele ukuthi ukungafani kwamasiko kungaholela kulokho abacabanga ukuthi ukuhlukunyezwa futhi akuyona into engavamile ukulandelwa, ukubamba ingalo, njll.
Yiba nesibindi sokwenqaba amadoda, futhi ungesabi ukuma endaweni yakho (ukungafani kwamasiko noma cha, akwenzi kube kuhle!).
Idolobha lanamuhla laseCasablanca lasungulwa abadobi baseBerber ngekhulu le-10 BCE, futhi lasetshenziswa amaFenike, amaRoma, namaMerenid njengechweba elingamasu elibizwa ngokuthi i-Anfa.
AmaPutukezi alibhubhisa futhi alivuselela ngaphansi kwegama elithi Casa Branca, kodwa alilahla ngemva kokuzamazama komhlaba ngo-1755.
USultan waseMorocco wakha kabusha leli dolobha ngokuthi uDaru l-Badya futhi wanikwa igama elithi Casablanca ngabathengisi baseSpain ababeka izisekelo zokuhweba lapho.
ICasablanca ingenye yezindawo ezithakazelisa kancane zokuthenga kulo lonke elaseMorocco.

Ezungeze iMedina endala kulula ukuthola izindawo ezithengisa izimpahla zendabuko zaseMorocco, ezifana nama-tagine, izimbiza, izimpahla zesikhumba, ama-hookah, kanye nemikhiqizo eminingi ye-gegaws, kodwa konke kungenxa yezivakashi.
IGoma yidolobha lezokuvakasha eDemocratic Republic of Congo elisempumalanga eseduze neRwanda.
Ngo-2002 iGoma yabhujiswa yi-lava evela entabeni yaseNyiragongo eyayingcwaba imigwaqo eminingi yedolobha, ikakhulukazi enkabeni yedolobha.
Nakuba iGoma iphephile, noma yikuphi ukuvakashelwa ngaphandle kweGoma kufanele kuhlolwe ukuze kuqondwe isimo sezimpi eziqhubeka esifundazweni saseNyakatho Kivu.
Leli dolobha liphinde libe yisisekelo sokukhuphuka intaba-mlilo yaseNyiragongo kanye namanye ama-Mountain Gorilla alula kakhulu e-Afrika.
Ungasebenzisa i-boda-boda (itekisi yesithuthuthu) ukuzungeza iGoma. Intengo ejwayelekile (yasendaweni) yi- ~ 500 francs yaseCongo ngenqola emfushane.
Ehlanganiswe nokungafinyeleleki kwayo, igama elithi "Timbuktu" liye lasetshenziswa njengendlela yokufanisa amazwe angaphandle, akude.
Namuhla, iTimbuktu idolobha elihluphekayo, nakuba idumela layo liyenza ibe indawo yokuheha izivakashi, futhi inesikhumulo sezindiza.
Ngo-1990, yafakwa ohlwini lwamagugu omhlaba asengozini, ngenxa yokusongelwa izihlabathi zasehlane.
Kwakungenye yezindawo ezinkulu zokumisa ngesikhathi senkulumo ekhethekile kaHenry Louis Gates ye-PBS ethi Wonders of the African World.
Leli dolobha lihluke kakhulu kwamanye amadolobha aleli zwe, ngoba linomusa wama-Arabhu kunama-Afrika.
IKruger National Park (KNP) itholakala enyakatho-mpumalanga yeNingizimu Afrika futhi iwela emngceleni weMozambique empumalanga, iZimbabwe enyakatho, kanti umngcele oseningizimu ungumfula iCrocodile.
Le paki ihlanganisa amakhilomitha-skwele angu-19 500 futhi ihlukaniswe yaba yizindawo eziphilayo ezihlukene ezingu-14, ngayinye isekela izilwane zasendle ezahlukene.
Ingenye yezinto eziheha kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika futhi ibhekwa njenge-flagship yeSouth African National Parks (i-SANParks).
Njengawo wonke amapaki kazwelonke aseNingizimu Afrika, kunezindleko zansuku zonke zokulondolozwa nokungena epaki.
Kungase futhi kube wusizo kumuntu ukuthenga i-Wild Card, enikeza ukungena noma yikuphi ukukhethwa kwamapaki eNingizimu Afrika noma kuwo wonke amapaki kazwelonke aseNingizimu Afrika.
Isiqhingi saseHong Kong sinikeza indawo yaseHong Kong igama laso futhi siyindawo izivakashi eziningi ezibheka njengendawo eyinhloko.
Ukubukeka kwezakhiwo ezenza iHong Kong ibe indawo enhle kakhulu kuye kwafaniswa nebalazwe elicwebezelayo lemigoqo elibonakala ngokuba khona kwamanzi aseVictoria Harbour.
Ukuze uthole ukubukwa okuhle kakhulu kweHong Kong, shiya lesi siqhingi uye ogwini lwaseKowloon olungaphesheya.
Iningi lentuthuko yasemadolobheni esiqhingini saseHong Kong ligcwele izindawo ezibuyiselwe ngasogwini olusenyakatho.
Le yindawo amakoloni aseBrithani ayithatha njengeyawo, ngakho uma ufuna ubufakazi besikhathi esidlule sasekoloni kule ndawo, lena yindawo enhle ongaqala kuyo.
I-Sundarbans iyibhande elikhulu kunawo wonke lama-mangrove asogwini emhlabeni, elandelana ngamakhilomitha angama-80 (50 mi) kuya emuva kweBangladeshi naseNdiya kusuka ogwini.
I-Sundarbans imenyezelwe njengeNdawo Yefa Lomhlaba ye-UNESCO. Ingxenye yehlathi ngaphakathi kwendawo yaseNdiya ibizwa ngokuthi yi-Sundarbans National Park.
Amahlathi akuwona nje amasango ama-mangrove nakuba  afaka ezinye zezitebhisi zokugcina ezisele emahlathini anamandla ayekade ehlanganisa iGangetic Plain.
Izindawo zaseSundarbans zihlanganisa indawo engamakhilomitha-skwele angu-3.850, ingxenye eyodwa kwezintathu yazo ihlanganiswe yamanzi/izindawo ezinamachibi.
Kusukela ngo-1966 iSundarbans ibilokhu iyisiphephelo sezilwane zasendle, futhi kulinganiselwa ukuthi manje kunezingwe zaseBengal zaseBengal ezingama - 400 nezinkomo ezingama - 30 000.

Amabhasi asuka esiteshini samabhasi esiphakathi kwezifunda (ngakolunye uhlangothi lomfula) usuku lonke, yize iningi, ikakhulukazi lawo aya empumalanga naseJakar / Bumthang lisuka phakathi kuka-6: 30 no-7: 30.

Ama-ejenti ezokuvakasha avame ukwenza izivumelwano namahhotela athile, nakuba ungase ukuthole kungenzeka ukubhuka ezinye izinhlobo zokuhlala, njengezindawo zokukhempa, ngokusebenzisa i-ejenti yezokuvakasha.

Ama-ejenti ezokuvakasha ngokuvamile anikela ngamaphakheji ahlanganisa ukudla kwasekuseni, amalungiselelo ezokuthutha aya/kusuka esikhumulweni sezindiza noma ngisho namaphakheji ezindiza namahhotela ahlanganisiwe.
Bangakwazi futhi ukubhuka uma udinga isikhathi sokucabanga ngesipho noma ukuthola eminye imibhalo lapho uya khona (isb. i-visa).
Noma iziphi izichibiyelo noma izicelo kufanele zihanjiswe nge-ejenti yezokuvakasha kuqala hhayi ngqo ehhotela.
Kweminye imikhosi, iningi elikhulu lalabo abahambela imikhosi yomculo linquma ukwakha ikamu endaweni, futhi abaningi abahambelayo bakubheka njengengxenye ebalulekile yokuhlangenwe nakho.
Uma ufuna ukuba seduze nesenzo kuzodingeka ufike kusenesikhathi ukuze uthole ikamu eduze nomculo.
Khumbula ukuthi nakuba umculo esiteji esiyinhloko ungase usuphelile, kungase kube nezingxenye zomkhosi ezizoqhubeka zidlala umculo kuze kube sebusuku.
Eminye imikhosi inezindawo ezikhethekile zokukhempa zemikhaya enezingane ezincane.
Uma uwela iNyakatho yeBaltic ebusika, hlola indawo yendlu, ngoba ukuwela iqhwa kubangela umsindo omubi kakhulu kulabo abathinteka kakhulu.
Izikhangibavakashi ze-Saint Petersburg zihlanganisa isikhathi edolobheni. Abagibeli be-cruise bayakhululwa ezidingweni ze-visa (hlola imigomo).
Amakhasino ngokuvamile enza imizamo eminingi ukuze afinyelele isikhathi nemali esetshenziswa izivakashi.
Ngokuvamile banokunikezwa okukhethekile kokudla, iziphuzo nokuzijabulisa, ukuze kugcinwe izivakashi zinesimo sengqondo esihle futhi zigcinwe endaweni.
Ezinye izindawo zokugembula zinikeza iziphuzo ezidakayo endlini, kodwa ukuphuza ngokweqile kuphazamisa ukwahlulela, futhi bonke abagembuli abahle bayazi ukubaluleka kokuhlala behluzekile.
Noma ubani ofuna ukushayela ezindaweni eziphakeme noma ezintabeni kufanele acabangele ukuthi kungenzeka iqhwa, iqhwa, noma izinga lokushisa eliqhwa.
Emigwaqweni eneqhwa neqhwa, ukungqubuzana kuncane futhi awukwazi ukushayela sengathi usemgwaqweni ophephile.
Phakathi nesiphepho seqhwa, iqhwa elanele ukuze ubambeke lingawa ngesikhathi esifushane kakhulu.
Ukubonakala kungavinjelwa futhi ukuwa noma ukuqhuma kweqhwa noma ukuqina noma iqhwa emafasiteleni emoto.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izimo zeqhwa neqhwa zivamile emazweni amaningi, futhi imoto ihamba ngokungaphazanyiswa unyaka wonke.
Kungenzeka ukuthi iSafaris iyindawo enkulu kunazo zonke ezokuvakasha e-Afrika futhi izivakashi eziningi ziyayijabulela.
Igama elithi safari elisetshenziswa kabanzi libhekisela ekuhambeni emhlabathini ukuze ubone izilwane zasendle zase-Afrika ezimangalisayo, ikakhulukazi e-savanna.
Ezinye izilwane, njengezindlovu nezinyoni, zivame ukusondela eduze kwezimoto futhi imishini ejwayelekile izovumela ukubuka okuhle.
Amabhubesi, ama-cheetah nama-leopard ngezinye izikhathi ayaba namahloni futhi uyowabona kangcono ngezibuko.
I-safari ehamba ngezinyawo (ebizwa nangokuthi "i-bush walk", "hiking safari", noma "ukuhamba ngezinyawo") iqukethe ukuhamba ngezinyawo, kungaba amahora ambalwa noma izinsuku eziningana.

Uma ungenayo insimbi, noma uma ungathandi ukugqoka amasokisi anensimbi, ungazama ukusebenzisa umshini wokomisa izinwele, uma utholakala.
Qaphela ukuba ungavumeli indwangu ishise kakhulu (engase ibangele ukuncipha, noma ezimweni ezimbi kakhulu, ukushisa).
Kunezindlela ezihlukahlukene zokuhlanza amanzi, ezinye zisebenza kangcono lapho kusongelwa izingozi ezithile.
Kwezinye izindawo amanzi abilayo umzuzu owodwa anele, kwamanye kudingeka imizuzu eminingana.
Izihlungi ziyahlukahluka ekusebenzeni kwazo, futhi uma unenkinga, kufanele ucabangele ukuthenga amanzi akho ebhodleleni elivaliwe enkampanini ehlonishwayo.
Abahambi bangase babhekane nezinambuzane zezilwane abangazazi ezindaweni abahlala kuzo.
Izinambuzane zingalimaza ukudla, zibangele ukucasuka, noma ezimweni ezimbi kakhulu zibangele ukusabela okungalawuleki, zisakaze ubuthi, noma zidlulisele izifo.
Izifo ezithathelwanayo ngokwazo, noma izilwane eziyingozi ezingalimaza noma zibulale abantu ngamandla, ngokuvamile azifaneleki njengezinambuzane.
Ukuthenga okungakhokhiswa intela kuyithuba lokuthenga izimpahla ezikhokhelwa intela kanye nama-accises ezindaweni ezithile.
Izihambi eziya emazweni anentela enzima ngezinye izikhathi zingonga imali eningi, ikakhulukazi emikhiqizweni enjengokuphuza utshwala nogwayi.
Umzila ophakathi kwePoint Marion neFairmont unikeza izimo eziyinkimbinkimbi kakhulu zokushayela emgwaqweni omkhulu waseBuffalo-Pittsburgh, odlula kaningi ezindaweni ezikude.
Uma ungajwayele ukushayela emigwaqweni yasemaphandleni, qaphela: imigwaqo emibi, imigwaqo emincane, nezigodi ezicijile zibusa.
Imikhawulo yesivinini esishiwo iphansi kakhulu kunasezingxenyeni zangaphambilini nezalandela  ngokuvamile 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h)  futhi ukulalela okuqinile kubo kubaluleke kakhulu kunangaphambili.
Nokho, ngokuthakazelisayo, isevisi yocingo ephathekayo iqine kakhulu lapha kunakwezinye izingxenye eziningi zomzila, ngokwesibonelo iPennsylvania Wilds.
Amakhekhe aseJalimane amahle kakhulu, futhi eBavaria, acebile futhi ahlukahlukene, afana nalawo omakhelwane bawo oseningizimu, i-Austria.
Izithelo ezibhakiwe zivamile, nama-apula aphekwe abe yizithelo unyaka wonke, futhi ama-cherry nama-plum abonakala ngesikhathi sasehlobo.
Izitsha eziningi zokubhaka zaseJalimane nazo zinamandongomane, ama-hazelnuts nezinye izihlahla.
Uma ufuna amakhekhe amancane kodwa acebile, zama lokho okubizwa ngokuthi iBerliner, i-Pfannkuchen noma i-Krapfen kuye ngendawo.
I-curry yisidlo esisekelwe ezitshalweni nezinongo, kanye nenyama noma imifino.
I-curry ingase ibe "omile" noma "esimanzi" kuye ngokuthi ingakanani uketshezi.
Ezindaweni zasenyakatho yeNdiya nasePakistan, i-yogurt ivame ukusetshenziswa kuma-curries; eningizimu yeNdiya nakwezinye izindawo ezisogwini lwezwekazi, ubisi lukakhukhunathi luvame ukusetshenziswa.
Njengoba kuneziqhingi ezingu-17.000 ongakhetha kuzo, ukudla kwase-Indonesia kuyisiqubulo esihlanganisa izinhlobo eziningi zokudla kwesifunda ezitholakala ezweni lonke.
Kodwa, uma lisetshenziswa ngaphandle kweziqu ezengeziwe, leli gama livame ukusho ukudla okuvela ezingxenyeni eziphakathi nempumalanga zesiqhingi esikhulu saseJava.

Manje esitholakala kabanzi kulo lonke isiqhingi, ukudla kwaseJava kunezinhlobonhlobo zezitsha ezilula, ukunambitheka okubaluleke kakhulu okuthandwa yiJava kungamazambane, ama-chillies, ushukela (ikakhulukazi ushukela kakhukhunathi waseJava) nezinongo ezihlukahlukene ezinamakha.
Ama-stirrup asekela izinyawo zomgibeli ezixhumeke ezinhlangothini zombili zesihlalo.
Zinikeza ukuzinza okwengeziwe kumgibeli kodwa zingaba nezinkinga zokuphepha ngenxa yokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi izinyawo zomgibeli zibambeke kuzo.
Uma umgibeli ephonswa ehhashini kodwa unonyawo olubambekile, angase adonswe uma ihhashi libaleka.
Okokuqala, abagibeli abaningi bagqoka izicathulo zokugibela ezinesithende nesithende esibushelelezi, esincane kakhulu.
Ngokulandelayo, ezinye izihlalo, ikakhulukazi izihlalo zaseNgilandi, zinezinsimbi zokuphepha ezivumela isikhumba esishukumisayo ukuba siwele esihlalweni uma sidonswa emuva umgibeli owayo.
ICochamo Valley - Indawo eyinhloko yaseChile yokukhuphuka, eyaziwa ngokuthi iYosemite yaseNingizimu Melika, enezindonga namadwala amaningi amakhulu egranite.
Abagibeli abavela kuzo zonke izingxenye zomhlaba baqhubeka besungula izindlela ezintsha phakathi kwamandla ayo angenamkhawulo ezindonga.
Ezemidlalo yeqhwa ehla ezintabeni, ezihlanganisa ukugibela ama-ski nokugibela ama-snowboard, ziyimidlalo ethandwa kakhulu ehlanganisa ukugibela ama-ski noma i-snowboard efakwe ezinyaweni.

IYurophu iyizwekazi elincane kodwa elinabantu abaningi abazimele.
Kodwa-ke, i-Schengen zone isebenza njengezwe elilodwa kulokhu.
Uma nje uhlala kule ndawo, ngokuvamile ungawela imingcele ngaphandle kokuphinde udlule ezindaweni zokuhlola amapasipoti.
Ngokufanayo, ngokuba ne-visa yaseSchengen, awudingi ukufaka isicelo se-visa ezweni ngalinye eliyingxenye yeSchengen ngokwehlukana, ngaleyo ndlela ugcine isikhathi, imali nemibhalo.
Ayikho incazelo evamile yokuthi izinto ezenziwe zingaba yizinto zakudala. Ezinye izikhungo zentela zichaza izimpahla ezineminyaka engaphezu kwekhulu njengezinto zakudala.
Incazelo inezinhlobonhlobo zendawo, lapho umkhawulo wobudala ungase ube mfushane ezindaweni ezifana neNyakatho Melika kunaseYurophu.
Imikhiqizo yezandla ingase ichazwe njengezinto zakudala, nakuba isencane kunezimpahla ezifanayo ezikhiqizwa ngobuningi.
